OrgName.entry: RECYCLING BRING BANK SITE - POSTAL DISTRICT 20

Desc.entry: Beighton Road Household Waste Recycling Centre - paper, glass, textiles & clothing, plastics, steel cans, aluminium & foil, furniture, motor oil, mobile phones, domestic paint, green waste, books, card, rubble, shoes, car batteries, scrap metal, electrical and electronic equipment, wood, household batteries, fluorescent tubes/lamps. Halfway Infant School, Station Lane - paper. Halfway Park and Ride, Halfway - paper, glass. Morrisons, Rotherham Road - paper, glass, textiles, plastics, steel cans, aluminium cans, books, card, shoes. The Alma Public House, 76 South Street - textiles. Westfield Flats, Westfield Centre - paper, glass, textiles.
